Constructor Detail

ComponentPrintable

public ComponentPrintable(java.awt.Component c)
Constructor for the pageable and printable object. JTextComponents are the only ones that are pageable. viewToModel and modelToView methods are used to make pagebreaks hopefully not across lines or pictures.

Parameters:
c - The Component to be printed. All but JTextComponents are printed on one page
Method Detail

print

public int print(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 java.awt.print.PageFormat pageFormat,
                 int pageIndex)
Required for Printable interface. Prints the page to the printer

Specified by:
print in interface java.awt.print.Printable
Parameters:
g - the graphics object. It should be for a printer
pageFormat - Landscape/portrait with dimensions
pageIndex - the index( starting at 0) for the page to be printed

getNumberOfPages

public int getNumberOfPages()
Required for pageable interface

Specified by:
getNumberOfPages in interface java.awt.print.Pageable
Returns:
returns 1 for non-JTextComponents othewise Pageable.UNKNOWN_NUMBER_OF_PAGES is returned
